## Directory of Antique Appraisers in Victoria, British Columbia  

### **Overview**  
Victoria hosts several accredited antique appraisal professionals offering services ranging from insurance valuations to estate planning. Specializations include fine art, jewelry/antique jewelry collections furniture/decorative arts estates/collections liquidation support Most operate via appointment-only basis with pricing typically starting at $150–$300/hour depending on complexity  

---

### **List of Antique Appraisal Services**  

#### **Coast Wide Appraisals**  
- **Specialty**: Residential/commercial property valuations; some decorative arts  
- **Contact**: 250-388-9151 | apprasials@coastapprasials.com  
- **Address**: 101–2220 Sooke Rd V9B0G8  
- **Years Active**: Established pre–2024 ([1])  

#### **Berchard Apraisal Services**
